typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as long,
		title as string,
		url as string,
		average_page_views_per_visit as double,
		bounce_rate as double,
		page_views as integer,
		visits as integer,
		date as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> AllAnalyticsPages
source(output(
		id as long,
		title as string,
		url as string,
		average_page_views_per_visit as double,
		bounce_rate as double,
		page_views as integer,
		visits as integer,
		date as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> NewAnalyticsPages
source(output(
		analytics_group_id as string,
		analytics_page_id as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:[("analytics_groups_analytics_pages/raw/**/*.csv")]) ~> RawAnalyticsGroupsAnalyticsPages
AllAnalyticsPages, NewAnalyticsPages union(byName: true)~> Consolidate
Consolidate aggregate(groupBy(id),
	each(match(name!='id'), $$ = last($$))) ~> RemoveDuplicates
RawAnalyticsGroupsAnalyticsPages aggregate(groupBy(analytics_group_id,
		analytics_page_id),
	count = count()) ~> RemoveDuplicateAnalyticsGroupsAnalyticsPages
RemoveDuplicateAnalyticsGroupsAnalyticsPages derive(outputFilePath = "analytics_groups_analytics_pages/staging/{analytics_group_id}.csv") ~> AddOutputFilePathColumn
RemoveDuplicates sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['analytics_pages.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DedupedAnalyticsPages
AddOutputFilePathColumn sink(input(
		analytics_page_id as string,
		analytics_group_id as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn:'outputFilePath',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DedupedAnalyticsGroupsAnalyticsPages

source(output(
		id as long,
		name as string,
		countryShortName as string,
		region as string,
		firstVisited as string,
		company as boolean,
		ignored as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Visitors
Visitors filter(!isNull(id)) ~> FilteredVisitors
FilteredVisitors aggregate(groupBy(id),
	each(match(name!='id'), $$ = first($$))) ~> DedupedVisitors
DedupedVisitors sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['deduped_visitors.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DedupedVisitorCsv

source(output(
		sessions as (duration as short, firstVisit as boolean, id as integer, pageViews as short, sessionStart as string, source as string, trackingPageIds as integer[], triggerIds as integer[], visitorId as integer)[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'sourceFilePath',
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine',
	wildcardPaths:[("visitor_feed/**/*.json")]) ~> VisitorFeed
AddDateColumn foldDown(unroll(sessions),
	mapColumn(
		duration = sessions.duration,
		firstVisit = sessions.firstVisit,
		id = sessions.id,
		pageViews = sessions.pageViews,
		sessionStart = sessions.sessionStart,
		source = sessions.source,
		trackingPageIds = sessions.trackingPageIds,
		triggerIds = sessions.triggerIds,
		visitorId = sessions.visitorId,
		sourceFilePath,
		date
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenVisitorSessions
AddOutputFilePathColumn foldDown(unroll(triggerIds),
	mapColumn(
		triggerId = triggerIds,
		visitorSessionId = id,
		outputFilePath
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenTriggerIds
FlattenTriggerIds filter(not(isNull(triggerId))) ~> FilterNullTriggerId
FilterNullTriggerId aggregate(groupBy(triggerId,
		visitorSessionId,
		outputFilePath),
	count = count()) ~> GroupByTriggerIdVisitorSessionId
FlattenVisitorSessions derive(outputFilePath = "triggers_visitor_sessions/{date}.json") ~> AddOutputFilePathColumn
FlattenVisitorSessions derive(outputFilePath = "visitor_sessions/{date}.json") ~> AddVisitorSessionOutputFilePathColumn
VisitorFeed derive(date = split(sourceFilePath, '/')[3]) ~> AddDateColumn
GroupByTriggerIdVisitorSessionId sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn:'outputFilePath',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TriggersVisitorSessions
AddVisitorSessionOutputFilePathColumn sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn:'outputFilePath',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> VisitorSessions

parameters{
	Date as string
}
source(output(
		sessions as (duration as short, firstVisit as boolean, id as integer, pageViews as short, sessionStart as string, source as string, trackingPageIds as integer[], triggerIds as integer[], visitorId as integer)[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine',
	wildcardPaths:[("visitor_feed/{$Date}/*.json")]) ~> VisitorFeed
VisitorFeed foldDown(unroll(sessions),
	mapColumn(
		duration = sessions.duration,
		firstVisit = sessions.firstVisit,
		id = sessions.id,
		pageViews = sessions.pageViews,
		sessionStart = sessions.sessionStart,
		source = sessions.source,
		trackingPageIds = sessions.trackingPageIds,
		triggerIds = sessions.triggerIds,
		visitorId = sessions.visitorId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenVisitorSessions
FlattenVisitorSessions foldDown(unroll(triggerIds),
	mapColumn(
		triggerId = triggerIds,
		visitorSessionId = id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenTriggerIds
FlattenTriggerIds filter(not(isNull(triggerId))) ~> FilterNullTriggerId
FilterNullTriggerId aggregate(groupBy(triggerId,
		visitorSessionId),
	count = count()) ~> GroupByTriggerIdVisitorSessionId
GroupByTriggerIdVisitorSessionId derive(outputFilePath = "triggers_visitor_sessions/{$Date}.json") ~> AddOutputFilePathColumn
FlattenVisitorSessions derive(date = $Date,
		outputFilePath = "visitor_sessions/{$Date}.json") ~> AddDateAndVisitorSessionOutputFilePathColumn
AddOutputFilePathColumn sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn:'outputFilePath',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TriggersVisitorSessions
AddDateAndVisitorSessionOutputFilePathColumn sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn:'outputFilePath',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> VisitorSessions

source(output(
		sessions as (duration as short, firstVisit as boolean, id as integer, pageViews as short, sessionStart as string, source as string, trackingPageIds as integer[], triggerIds as integer[], visitorId as integer)[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'fileName',
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine',
	wildcardPaths:[("visitor_feed/**/*.json")]) ~> VisitorFeed
AddDateColumn foldDown(unroll(sessions),
	mapColumn(
		duration = sessions.duration,
		firstVisit = sessions.firstVisit,
		visitorSessionId = sessions.id,
		pageViews = sessions.pageViews,
		sessionStart = sessions.sessionStart,
		source = sessions.source,
		trackingPageIds = sessions.trackingPageIds,
		triggerIds = sessions.triggerIds,
		visitorId = sessions.visitorId,
		date
	),
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		date
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenVisitorSessions
FlattenVisitorSessions foldDown(unroll(triggerIds),
	mapColumn(
		triggerId = triggerIds,
		visitorSessionId,
		date
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenTriggerIds
FlattenTriggerIds filter(not(isNull(triggerId))) ~> FilterNullTriggerId
FilterNullTriggerId aggregate(groupBy(triggerId,
		visitorSessionId,
		date),
	each(match(!in(['date','triggerId','visitorSessionId'],name)), $$ = first($$))) ~> DedupTriggerIdVisitorSessionId
DedupTriggerIdVisitorSessionId derive(outputFilePath = "triggers_visitor_sessions/{date}.json") ~> AddOutputFilePathColumn
VisitorFeed derive(date = split(fileName, '/')[3]) ~> AddDateColumn
AddOutputFilePathColumn sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn:'outputFilePath',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TriggersVisitorSessions

source(output(
		sessions as (duration as short, firstVisit as boolean, id as integer, pageViews as short, sessionStart as string, source as string, trackingPageIds as integer[], triggerIds as integer[], visitorId as integer)[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'sourceFilePath',
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine',
	wildcardPaths:[("visitor_feed/**/*.json")]) ~> VisitorFeed
VisitorFeed derive(date = split(sourceFilePath, '/')[3]) ~> AddDateColumn
AddDateColumn foldDown(unroll(sessions),
	mapColumn(
		duration = sessions.duration,
		firstVisit = sessions.firstVisit,
		id = sessions.id,
		pageViews = sessions.pageViews,
		sessionStart = sessions.sessionStart,
		source = sessions.source,
		trackingPageIds = sessions.trackingPageIds,
		triggerIds = sessions.triggerIds,
		visitorId = sessions.visitorId,
		date
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenVisitorSessions
FlattenVisitorSessions derive(outputFilePath = "visitor_sessions/{date}.json") ~> AddOutputFilePathColumn
AddOutputFilePathColumn sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn:'outputFilePath',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> VisitorSessions
